templates.saving-vaults--launch-beta.con: 1. Ensure that you have CVC checks on your account. With these checks enabled, we will decline payments when the customer fails to provide correct CVC information, which helps prevent fraud. You can turn on a rule to block a payment if the CVC check fails in your [Radar dashboard]({radar_link}). Make sure that you are sending us CVC data in order for the checks to work. 2. Review payments for anything out of the ordinary. As a business owner, you have the most information about what's normal for your business. Refund suspicious transactions (unusually large orders, multiple payments on one card in a short time period, etc.) to avoid disputed payments. 3. Read about more tips for fraud prevention [here]({support_link}).
